content: As an AI language model, I cannot provide medical advice. However, consulting with a medical professional before making any significant change in your diet or lifestyle is always recommended. Generally, it is recommended to maintain a regular eating schedule to keep blood sugar levels stable in people with diabetes, so snacks can be a part of a healthy meal plan. You may want to plan ahead and carry healthy snack options with you, which can help prevent overeating and reduce the risk of consuming unhealthy snacks. It’s also important to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day.
